description: My place is close to The Grange Bar & Eatery, Picante, Filter Coffee, and the Hudson River. You’ll love my place because of the light, the ambiance, and the view. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Spacious 1 Bedroom with a Lovely View!
review: Quite and comfortable stay. Good subway connection and really friendly host !
